|brand = D-Link |model = DWA-171 |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = C1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 03/07/2018 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/D-Link_DWA-171_rev_C1 |sernum = SY9Z1 |wlclass = AC600 |series = DWA-171 |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = Male A |formfactor = micro dongle
|vendor_id = 2001 |device_id = 331d |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = KA2WA171C1 |icid = 4216A-WA171C1 |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = <!-- OUI -->
|chip1 = Realtek;RTL8811CU;RTL8811CU, H5P99P8, GH28; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 1 |rxchains = 1 |sstreams = 1 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |802.11ac = 433 |nqam = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |802.11n = 150/150 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = <!-- https://github.com/uzh-rpg/rpg_dwa171_wifidongle --> |windriv =
|is_manuf = No |manuf = Cameo |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = 8MB SPI NOR Flash;Winbond;W25Q64JV;;1; |flags = Wave2, MU-MIMO, DFS (slave), WPS |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 02/06/2018 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = China
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "WA171" and "BWA171 OC1G" are silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
This revision has a Wireless Protected Setup (WPS) pushbutton on one side while previous revisions appear not to. This adapter contains an 8MB [[Winbond]] W25Q64JV serial NOR flash chip which hold drivers for Windows operating systems.
===Linux drivers=== *X86 beta version: [https://dtrack.dlink.com.tw/file/case/DUSA20181113000001/2/1/20181022_DWA-171C_RTL8811CU_Linux_driver_v5.4.1(1116171507).zip DWA-171C_RTL8811CU_Linux_driver_v5.4.1] *I386 version: [ftp://ftp2.dlink.com/PRODUCTS/DWA-171/REVC/DWA-171_REVC_DRIVER_v5.2.15.2_RTL8811CU_LINUX.zip DWA-171_REVC_DRIVER_v5.2.15.2_RTL8811CU_LINUX] *Linux version (updated for kernel >= +4.15):[https://github.com/uzh-rpg/rpg_dwa171_wifidongle rpg_dwa171_wifidongle]
[[Category:English Documentation]]
